name: terminal-command-trigger
description: Trigger VSCode commands when shell commands are executed. Perfect for auto-restarting clangd before builds.

default.description: Stop clangd before xmake build, start after completion

pattern.description: Regular expression to match terminal command

onStart.description: Action to execute when command starts. Use 'ext:extensionId:api.path' for extension API calls, or command name for VSCode commands.

onEnd.description: Action to execute when command ends. Use 'ext:extensionId:api.path' for extension API calls, or command name for VSCode commands.

terminalCommandTrigger.triggers.description: List of terminal command patterns and their corresponding actions
terminalCommandTrigger.triggers.markdownDescription:
Configure triggers for terminal commands.

**Action syntax:**
- VSCode command: `clangd.restart`
- Extension API: `ext:extension-id:api.path`

**Examples:**
- `ext:llvm-vs-code-extensions.vscode-clangd:client.stop`
- `workbench.action.tasks.runTask`

terminalCommandTrigger.showNotification.description: Show status bar notification when a command is triggered

terminalCommandTrigger.notificationDurat.description: Duration (in milliseconds) to show the status bar notification
